senses.sense_definition: Someone or something that puts a bridle on an animal.

examples.text: The stable employed a skilled <w>bridler</w> to prepare the horses for the morning ride.
As a <w>bridler</w>, he knew exactly how to calm the mare before securing the gear.

senses.sense_definition: Someone or something that restrains, controls, or governs actions or events.

examples.text: The new regulation acts as a <w>bridler</w> of excessive spending within the department.
She saw herself as a necessary <w>bridler</w> of the team's reckless enthusiasm.
